pkgmetadata.longdescription: Cox Model for Case-Cohort Data with Stratified Subcohort- Selection // Contains a function, also called 'cchs', that calculates Estimator III of Borgan et al (2000), DOI:10.1023/A:1009661900674. This estimator is for fitting a Cox proportional hazards model to data from a case-cohort study where the subcohort was selected by stratified simple random sampling.
